Boss Battle Rules Reminder GW2
0 Token Token
1 1. Boss is a subtype of battle 2. A Boss is a creature on your turn. This means it can attack, tap, be sacrificed, sing, dance, etc. 3. Bosses enter with defense counters equal to their printed toughness. 4. Bosses die when they take damage equal to or greater than their toughness (when a creature) or when they do not have any defense counters on them. (If it is not a creature, it will not trigger effects that care about creatures dying.) 5. When a battle takes damage, remove that many defense counters from it. 6. On their turns, your opponents can declare attackers at the battles you defend, including bosses.
